mapper.select: SELECT p.PRODUCT_NO as productNo, p.PRODUCT_TITLE as productTitle, p.PRODUCT_ADULT_PRICE as productAdultPrice, p.PRODUCT_CHILD_PRICE as productChildPrice, p.TOUR_START_DATE as tourStartDate, p.TOUR_END_DATE as tourEndDate, p.PRODUCT_VEHICLE as productVehicle, p.PRODUCT_VISIT_PLACE as productVisitPlace, p.PRODUCT_RESERVATION_NUMBER as productReservationNumber, p.PRODUCT_CONTENT as productContent, p.PRODUCT_CATEGORY as productCategory m.MEDIA_DATA as productMediaData m.MEDIA_TYPE as productMediaType FROM PRODUCT p, MEDIA m WHERE p.PRODUCT_NO = m.PRODUCT_NO ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC

SELECT p.PRODUCT_NO as productNo, p.PRODUCT_TITLE as productTitle, p.PRODUCT_ADULT_PRICE as productAdultPrice, p.PRODUCT_CHILD_PRICE as productChildPrice, p.TOUR_START_DATE as tourStartDate, p.TOUR_END_DATE as tourEndDate, p.PRODUCT_VEHICLE as productVehicle, p.PRODUCT_VISIT_PLACE as productVisitPlace, p.PRODUCT_RESERVATION_NUMBER as productReservationNumber, p.PRODUCT_CONTENT as productContent, p.PRODUCT_CATEGORY as productCategory m.MEDIA_DATA as productMediaData m.MEDIA_TYPE as productMediaType FROM PRODUCT p, MEDIA m WHERE p.PRODUCT_NO = m.PRODUCT_NO p.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
